critique: This is an executive order that extends the exemption of Samuel J. Gompers from compulsory retirement for one year. It is difficult to assess the political bias of this document as it pertains to a specific individual and does not contain broad policy implications. The order itself doesn't inherently lean liberal or conservative. It doesn't directly impact immigration, executive power in a significant way, federalism, national security, economic regulation, or social inclusion. Therefore, most scores will be neutral.
